head.title: Add Metadata to {{EXT}} Files in {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: {{ProgLang}} metadata processing API to add metadata information to {{EXT}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc.

header.title: Adding Metadata To {{EXT}} In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Add custom metadata properties to a wide range of business documents, images, audio & video file formats using {{ProductFullName}}.

about.title: About {{ProductFullName}} API
about.h1: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/metadata/{{ProductCode}}/) is an advanced metadata fields management and manipulation solution to easily view, update, remove, find, compare, exchange and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Add metadata details to Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, OneNote, Visio, Project, PDF, AutoCAD, ZIp, Audio and Video file formats along with the support for working with many other metadata processing features.

steps.title_left: Steps for adding Metadata to {{EXT}} in {{ProgLang}}

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{slash_lang}}/metadata/{{ProductCode}}/) makes it easy for {{ProductName}} developers to add metadata details to {{EXT}} files from within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content_left.step_1: Load {{EXT}} with an instance of Metadata class.
content_left.step_2: Use Metadata.AddProperties method to add the properties.
content_left.step_3: Use a predicate to find desired metadata properties.
content_left.step_4: Save the changes back in {{EXT}} format.

content_right.description: {{ProductFullName}} APIs are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, please make sure that you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_right.step_1: Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
content_right.step_4: Get the latest version of  {{ProductFullName}} from [{{RepoName}}]({{RepoUrl}})

steps.title_code: How to adding Metaddata {{EXT}} file using {{ProgLang}} example code

code.load_commnet: load the file in an instance of Metadata class
code.add_comment: add a property containing the content author
